plot: Isolated on a wandering spacecraft, a sentient super-computer uses the ship's nanotech assembler to experience the memories of its long-extinct crew.
title: Advanced Cybernetics
plot_es: Isolated on a wandering spacecraft, a sentient super-computer uses the ship's nanotech assembler to experience the memories of its long-extinct crew.
plot_en: Isolated on a wandering spacecraft, a sentient super-computer uses the ship's nanotech assembler to experience the memories of its long-extinct crew.
